name: Voxel game play test.
description:
This game is in a play test state. It is a voxel game.

W: forward

S: back

A: strafe left

D: strafe right

Mouse: look around

Space: jump + vertical flying up

Tab: toggle flying mode

Left-Shift: vertical flying down

Left-Ctrl: run

ESC: release mouse

1-0: Blocks
